statement.p: Find the slope of the line that goes through the points (12,-14) and (8,4).
Enter your answer as an integer or a reduced fraction in the form A/B

ul.li: \displaystyle\frac{{{4}-{\left(-{14}\right)}}}{{{8}-{\left({12}\right)}}}=\frac{{18}}{{-{{4}}}} which reduces to \displaystyle-\frac{{9}}{{2}} (if it's not already reduced)
